alert.note: Alert for Forsyth; Guilford (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 16 at 4:55PM EDT until June 16 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR EAST CENTRAL FORSYTH AND WEST CENTRAL GUILFORD COUNTIES... At 455 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms that were producing heavy rain have moved out of the warned area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Greensboro, High Point, Kernersville and Colfax. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
